Course_Name: Tangyang: Imperial Qing Chinese Architectural Paper Models in Theory and Practice - Seminar SoSe 2024

Messages.Author: Gabriele Böhm
Messages.Content: Liebe Studierende,  die Prüfungsanmeldung ist in MOSES eröffnet, bitte melden Sie sich an.  Mit freundlichen Grüßen  Gabriele Böhm Sekretariat Bau- und Stadtbaugeschichte

Messages.Author: Ursula Quatember
Messages.Content: Dear participants, Tomorrow the "hands-on" part of our Tangyang seminar will start in the workshops at Ackerstraße 76 at 10 am and 1:30 pm respectively. We will start the workshop with an introduction from our Chinese colleagues from Tsinghua University. There are still some slots available. If you are interested in the course but haven't signed up yet, you can still join. We are looking forward to seeing you tomorrow! Best wishes, Ursula Quatember

Messages.Author: Ursula Quatember
Messages.Content: Dear Participants, You have signed up for the Tangyang Seminar. On ISIS you will find the schedule for the hands-on part of the seminar in the workshop in Ackerstraße and the list of participants. Please check your information and confirm with a short email that you will to participate in the seminar! If there are any changes, please let us know as soon as possible. Best wishes, Ursula Quatember
